short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows desire entity/sensor/attribute from Home Assistant instance in a Chrome based browsers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, you can show in the extension's icon the status of a desired sensor/entities/attribute from Home Assistant
